about.name: Zaheer Khan
about.title: AI/ML Engineer | Data Scientist
about.summary: I am a final-semester statistics student with hands-on experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, and Web Development. Currently interning at a tech company, building projects that combine AI, NLP, and full-stack development. Passionate about solving real-world problems with data-driven solutions.
about.about_me:
I’m Zaheer Khan, an AI Engineer with a foundation in BS Statistics, web development, and advanced training in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science. My expertise spans LLMs, Generative & Agentic AI, NLP, CV, ML/DL, Prompt Engineering, RAG, and deployment tools like MLflow, Docker, and FastAPI. Alongside this, I also have hands-on experience in MERN stack development.

I’m passionate about building intelligent systems that merge data, AI, and real-world applications, and my long-term goal is to become an AI expert and launch my own AI-driven startup.
about.my_journey: Statistics Foundation → Began my academic journey with a BS in Statistics, building strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Web Development → Completed a 1-year course in MERN stack, gaining experience in building scalable and interactive web applications. AI & Data Science → Transitioned into AI & Data Science, where I learned machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and computer vision. AI Engineer → Currently working on Generative & Agentic AI, LLMs, and AI deployment, with projects focused on fine-tuning, RAG pipelines, and intelligent systems. Future Vision → Striving to become an AI expert and eventually found my own startup to deliver impactful AI solutions.

highlights: Specialized in statistical modeling, probability, and data analysis
Capstone project on predictive modeling in healthcare

responsibilities: Worked on NLP models using Hugging Face and Transformers
Built end-to-end ML pipelines for classification tasks
Created visualization dashboards for business insights
Developed responsive websites using React and Flask
Deployed projects on Vercel and Streamlit Cloud
Integrated APIs and built dynamic user interfaces

projects.name: Chest X-ray Pneumonia Detection
projects.description: Built a CNN model using TensorFlow to classify chest X-rays as Normal or Pneumonia. Deployed the model using Flask and tested on real-world images.

projects.name: Customer Support Chatbot
projects.description: Fine-tuned DistilBERT multilingual model on a Kaggle dataset to build a customer support chatbot that answers queries naturally.

projects.name: Code Analyzer
projects.description: Developed a tool using CodeBERT + Pylint to analyze Python and Jupyter Notebook files for code quality and bug detection. Deployed via Streamlit.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website built with React and deployed on Vercel. Showcased projects, skills, and achievements with integrated chatbot.

projects.name: Movie Recommender
projects.description: Movie Recommendation System built with FastAPI, Bootstrap, and Python. The app allows users to search and select movies, then provides top 5 recommendations using a content-based filtering model. Integrated with TMDB API for fetching movie posters. Deployed on Render with a clean and responsive UI.

achievements: Completed Machine Learning and Deep Learning specializations
Built AI-powered OMR sheet answer detection model
Created sentiment analysis tool using Twitter RoBERTa model
